programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Miten saalistajasta tuleekin saalis? Villielainten hyokkaysten kohteeksi joutuneet ihmiset kertovat kokemuksistaan.

programme.title: Matkalla elainlaakariksi
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kuuden elainlaakariopiskelijan elamaa ja opintoja heidan viimeisena opiskeluvuotenaan. Tulevien elainlaakareiden hoivissa apua saavat kaikenkarvaiset elaimet koosta riippumatta. (Life at Vet U, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Puukuiskaaja Pete Nelson ja hanen tiiminsa suunnittelevat yksilollisia piilopaikkoja luontoyhteyttaan etsiville, sisaisen lapsensa herattaneille ihmisille.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Antonio saapuu auttamaan perhetta, joka on avannut pihansa portit koko naapuruston koirille. Pihalle pystytetaan kahluuallas, ramppeja, tunneleita ja uniikkeja koirankoppeja!

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Julmat siteet. Tutkija Marisa McHugh ja kenttatyon johtaja Stacie DaBolt rientavat auttamaan koiraa, joka on jatetty kuolemaan roskalavalle raajat sidottuina.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Rikosaie. Tutkija Marisa McHugh yrittaa pelastaa koiranpennun, jonka joku on yrittanyt tappaa, ja alkaa sitten selvittaa, kuka on vastuussa teosta.

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Carolyn Wise lahtee hirvimetsalle. Flower-jarven ryhma jahtaa oravia. Toiset ryhmat turvautuvat epatoivoisiin ruuanetsintakeinoihin.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Miten saalistajasta tuleekin saalis? Villielainten hyokkaysten kohteeksi joutuneet ihmiset kertovat kokemuksistaan.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kissoja, jotka mm. aiheuttavat eroja tai pistavat omistajansa jopa sairaalaan. Kissojen kaytosasiantuntija Jackson Galaxy yrittaa parantaa kurittomia kissoja.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tiimi saa eteensa kaikkien aikojen vaikeimman pelastustapauksensa. Elainsuojeluviranomaiset ovat valmiina ottamaan jutun vastaan, mutta Tian on ensin pelastettava koiralauma.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia pelastaa hylatyn koiranpennun likaisesta elinymparistosta. Pelastuuko pennun henki? Kaksi koiranomistajaa etsii sisarusta nelivuotiaalle Chace-koiralleen.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: New Yorkin Bronxissa sijaitsevassa elaintarhassa asuu yli 6000 elainta, joiden hyvinvoinnista vastaa 500 asialleen omistautunutta tyontekijaa. Sarja vie elaintarhan kiehtoviin kulisseihin, joissa jokainen paiva on taynna yllatyksia.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Jackson-maakotkaa harjoitutetaan esiintyjaksi opetusohjelmiin. Elaintenhoitajat kertovat afrikkalaisten villikoirien luonteenpiirteista.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Irwinin perhe on vuoden kestaneiden metsapalopelastustoimien ja maailmanlaajuisen pandemiasulun jalkeen valmiita uuteen kauteen ja he avaavat Australian elaintarhansa ja palaavat rakkaan tyonsa pariin hoitamaan elaimia.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Bindi suunnittelee perheensa kanssa tunteikasta yllatysta Terille Crocoseumissa. Lisaksi Robert jaa jumiin auttaessaan elaintarhan kolmea uutta tiikerinpentua.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Afrikanpingiviinien yhteiso toivottaa uusimmat jasenet tervetulleeksi parittelukauden jalkeen. Lisaksi uusi merisaukko laitetaan lajitoveriensa joukkoon.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Lizzy ja Marcel lahtevat yhdessa ottamaan kiinni keskustan kaduilla irti vaeltelevaa pitbullia. Tian muistelmat ovat valmiit ja han jakaa uuden kirjansa ensin perheensa kanssa.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Taran kissa Cali rakastaa omistajaansa, mutta hyokkaa vierailijan paalle. Kurtin kissa Kurtis Jr tuhoaa ja syo kaiken tieltaan. Kissojen kaytostuntija Jackson Galaxy saapuu apuun.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 4. Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin. (Animal Cribs, lifestyle, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 5. Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin. (Animal Cribs, lifestyle, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Elaimet tekevat uskomattomia asioita, mutta oletko koskaan pohtinut miten tai miksi? Sarjassa vastatataan kiehtovimpiin elainaiheisiin kysymyksiin.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 24. Elaimet tekevat uskomattomia asioita, mutta oletko koskaan pohtinut miten tai miksi? Sarjassa vastatataan kiehtovimpiin elainaiheisiin kysymyksiin. (How Do Animals Do That?, dokumentti, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Matka maailman ympari nayttaa, miten koirasta tuli maailman arvostetuimpiin elaimiin kuuluva laji. Ihmisen parhaan ystavan tarina kulkee villipedosta lempeaksi lemmikiksi.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Perheomistuksessa olevan viinitilan johtaja tilaa kauniin riutta-akvaarion olohuoneeseensa. Vaatimuksena on, etta se valmistuu ennen sadonkorjuuta.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: NFL:n arvopelaajiin kuuluva Adrian Peterson tilaa tyylikkaan akvaarion, joka on hanen pokaalikaappiaankin arvokkaampi.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Asiantuntijat analysoivat uusia todisteita, jotka voisivat osoittaa, etta Bray Roadin petoon terrorisoinut kaupunkia Wisconsinissa. Ja leviaako ihmis-susi-hybridi Yhdysvalloissa?

programme.title: Great White Appetite
programme.desc: Tieteilijoilla ei ole tarkkoja tietoja suuren valkohain maarasta, lisaantymisesta eika ruokailutottumuksista. Onko uusista tiedoista apua?

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: The barn joins forces with a charity to find homes for four neglected calves. Meanwhile, a litter of piglets are born and Chris builds a playground for the goats.

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Syksyn lopulla Charlie valmistautuu muuttamaan vanhempiensa luota omaan mokkiinsa. Heimo ja Edna jattavat jaahyvaiset Krinn-tyttarelleen ja lapsenlapselleen Colby-pojalle.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Elainsuojelujarjesto Animal Defenders International on tyoskennellyt 40 vuotta sirkuselainten kieltamiseksi. Suurimmat pelastusoperaatiot tapahtuvat Perussa.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Matka maailman ympari nayttaa, miten koirasta tuli maailman arvostetuimpiin elaimiin kuuluva laji. Ihmisen parhaan ystavan tarina kulkee villipedosta lempeaksi lemmikiksi.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Villit ja vapaat Brownit elavat Alaskan eramaassa. Seitsenlapsisen perheen elama kaikkien modernien mukavuuksien ulkopuolella riippuu perheenjasenten keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Alkaa uusintana. Dokumentaarinen sarja seuraa Pennsylvaniassa toimivan SPCA´s Humane Law Enforcementin tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elaimien hyvaksi.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Salainen operaatio. Tiimi auttaa takapihalle pakkaseen jatettya koiraa seka jateviemariin juuttunutta kissaa. (Animal Cops Philadelphia, tosi-tv, USA, 2008)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Dokumentaarinen sarja seuraa Pennsylvaniassa toimivan SPCA´s Humane Law Enforcementin tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elaimien hyvaksi.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Uusimmalla kamerateknologialla luonnollisessa ymparistossaan kuvatut minihirviot nayttavat taitojaan ja pullistelevat juuri niin isoina kuin ne kuvittelevat olevansa.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Madagaskarin Manambatosta etsitaan tomaattisammakkoa. Se on yksi maailman merkittavimmista vaijyvista pedoista ja pystyy hautautumaan maahan vain muutamassa sekunnissa.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tigger-kissan epatavallisia ruokailutottumuksia pidetaan tiukasti silmalla. Elainlaakari Jeff varoittaa sairaan koiranpennun omistajaa nettiostamisen vaaroista.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Australian suurten metsapalojen jalkeen Irwinit kiirehtivat pelastamaan niin paljon elaimia kuin vain pystyvat. Robert ja Terri auttavat vahingoittuneita koalakarhuja.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Juuri syntyneella Talbert-kirahvilla ilmenee komplikaatioita. Lisaksi Robert pelastaa siimaan jumiin jaaneen joutsenen.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Tiimi odottaa innoissaan nayttelyn avaamista, jossa on harvinaisia albiinoalligaattoreita. Lisaksi sukeltajien pitaa sukeltaa valashai Tarokon kanssa saadakseen verinaytteen.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Villalobos saa kasiinsa vaikean pelastustilanteen, kun tulipalon jaljilta paljastuu valtava koirakokoelma. Kaksi opettajaa rakastuu kuuroon koiranpentuun.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kaytosasiantuntija Jackson Galaxy auttaa kiivaiden kissojen omistajia. Kissat rikkovat ihmissuhteita ja saavat omistajansa jopa sairaalakuntoon. Jacksonille ei mikaan ole vierasta!

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Antonio rakentaa vuoristomajan, joka on turvallinen sokealle koiravanhus Chickielle. Lisaksi rakennetaan japanilaistyylinen koiraolohuone.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Antonio loihtii uuden kodin papukaijojen pelastuskeskusta pyorittavalle pariskunnalle ja 23 linnulle. Papukaijat saavat ulkoilmahakin, jossa ne voivat lentaa.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 5. Mita jos sukupuuttoon kuolleita lajeja onkin edelleen olemassa? Villielaimiin erikoistunut biologi Forrest Galante kiertaa maapalloa etsimassa lajeja, jotka muu maailma on jo unohtanut. Tyovalineinaan hanella on huipputeknologiaa seka kaikkiin elaimiin kohdistuva syva tiedonjano. Etsinnat vievat Forrestin kaukaisiin ja joskus vaarallisiinkin paikkoihin. (Extinct Or Alive, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the largest bicycle factory in Britain which produces 150 folding bike every 24 hours and joins a multi-stage manual production line to make his own bicycle. Meanwhile Cherry Healey gets some tips from Cycling Team GB to help us all improve our pedal power, including how lowering your body position can make a 10 per cent improvement to speed and efficiency. And historian Ruth Goodman reveals that folding bikes date back to the 1870s, and how 70,000 folding `parabikes were manufactured during the Second World War, some of which played a role in the D-Day landings

programme.title: Serengeti
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a great fire, the animal characters struggle to survive in an unrecognisable and inhospitable land. Amid the choking smoke, Bakari, the baboon, discovers the charred skull of his rival, but that does little to calm the rebellious factions in his troop. Finding a new home is now more urgent than ever. As the troops quest takes them across the burnt wastelands, Bakari tries to work out how to crack an ostrich egg, with comical consequences. At a rocky outcrop, they find a fig tree that can provide all the food they need. But when a flock of angry eagles attack, the troop are cast out into the wilderness once more. When the fire took hold, Kali the lioness found refuge in a cave on her rock kopje, but now it’s over, she and her cubs are trapped there while her sister gives birth. They are separated from the pride with nothing to eat and no-one to defend them. Can Askari, the pride male, reunite them in time, or will the tiny cubs fall victim to a hungry puff adder? The fire separated Mzuri, the young leopardess, from her mother and sister. To survive, she tries to hunt a warthog. When that fails, she tries catching Utani the mongoose and the pup he cares for, but with no better luck. Will she be reunited with her family? As the rains arrive, things start to look up. The blackened land turns green, bringing hope for all. Utani takes the pup to meet the warthogs, whose thick coats provide a feast of ticks and fleas for the bold. He soon discovers that taking his pup there wasn’t his wisest move. When the baboons finally do find themselves a new home, they discover Kali’s sister has taken up residence and is not accepting guests. Can Bakari risk moving his troop in? Meanwhile, Kali takes her cubs on their first hunt. This could be her biggest mistake yet.

programme.title: Life Below Zero

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace helps to unload a tanker full of sugar from Norfolk and follows it through one of the oldest sweet factories in Britain - Swizzels in Derbyshire - to see how more than 500 workers, as well as some mind-boggling machines, transform it into over 100 million individual sweets within just 24 hours. Cherry Healey finds out how the letters are put in seaside rock and is given special access to the Fishermans Friend factory in Lancashire to discover how a local family turned a niche product into a worldwide success

programme.title: Wonders of the Solar System
programme.desc: Discover how beauty and order in Earths cosmic backyard was formed from nothing more than a chaotic cloud of gas. Chasing tornados in Oklahoma, Professor Brian Cox explains how the same physics that creates these spinning storms shaped the young solar system. Out of this celestial maelstrom emerged the jewel in the crown, Brians second wonder - the magnificent rings of Saturn.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits the UKs largest sports shoe factory to see how 3,500 pairs of trainers are made every day, before meeting the man who comes up with the latest designs. Cherry Healey gets hands-on in a tannery, helping to process thousands of rawhides into finished leather for the nations shoes, and finds out how a ballet company painstakingly create 250,000 ballet shoes per year. Ruth Goodman reveals how, when the sewing machine was first introduced into shoe factories in the mid-19th century, traditional shoemakers went on strike to rebel against joining a restrictive production line

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMThursday 4 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Palermo to Mt EtnaSeason 7 Episode 4 of 10SSubtitlesOn a railway journey from the capital Palermo, through the ancient town of Agrigento and the port of Siracusa, to Europes largest volcano, Mount Etna, Michael Portillo explores Sicilian life under the dictatorship. He also finds out how the dictator took on the Mafia and asks whether it is true that under Mussolini, the trains ran on timeGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Thursday 4 January. programme.title: The Secret Life of Trees
programme.desc: Even the mightiest oak must start life as a tiny acorn. We explore the secret lives of young trees, discovering how they magically transform from minute seeds into mature adults. But with fewer than one in a thousand seeds reaching adulthood, a trees early years are the most treacherous of its life. 1/3

programme.title: Wonders of the Solar System
programme.desc: Discover how something as flimsy as an envelope of gas - an atmosphere - can create some of the most wondrous sights in the solar system. Professor Brian Cox takes a flight to the top of earths atmosphere, where he sees the darkness of space above and the thin blue line of our atmosphere below. Against the stunning backdrop of the glaciers of Alaska, Brian reveals his fourth wonder: Saturns moon Titan, shrouded by a murky, thick atmosphere.

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong
programme.desc: The presenter embarks on a journey across Iceland, traversing the full breadth of the country to discover more about Icelands unique culture, wildlife and landscapes. He begins his Icelandic adventure in a helicopter, hovering just yards above the rim of an erupting and lethal volcano close to the capital of Reykjavik, before heading east to Icelands Golden Circle, which is home to some of its most famous sights.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Truff is happy. He has found a necklace that makes him even Truffier! Except he had no idea the necklace belongs to Starmush. And the Mushelder promised there will be consequences for whoever took it. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit now have to save Truff from being consequenced…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is under pressure. Truff, the most talented musician in Mushton, has invited her, Mush-Mush and Chep to form a band with him. Only problem is they can hardly play music! Truff insists: they just need to relax and feel the groove. But when Truff tells his new band they will perform at the Food Snail, Lilit isn’t relaxed at all!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because he has won the moss-ball game last year, Puff is in charge of organizing this Summer’s Picnic. Only Puff isn’t comfortable in that role. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to help and make sure all the Mushables will follow Puff’s lead. Gradually, Puff gains confidence and ends up bossing everyone around. Now, all the Mushables are about to flee the Picnic!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit notice that Mushpie seems in great shape lately. They want to feel as great as she does and try to discover her secret.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chep asks Mush-Mush and Lilit to go storm-watching and they refuse, Lilit feels bad and convinces Mush-Mush to join their friend.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Fung and Miff have come across a rare piece of bark struck by lightning.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings pace around the log cabin searching for virtual animals to capture with their tablet game. Annoyed by their behavior, Grizzy throws them outside. Determined to continue playing, the Lemmings trick the bear. But when the tablet hits the circuit breaker and explodes, the gaming animals come to life! Ice dinosaurs, laser caribous and giant carnivorous plants. The life-size hunt can begin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A snowstorm rips the solar panels off the log cabin and Grizzy can no longer watch TV or enjoy the comforts of home! But he has a brilliant idea. He produces electricity by making a caribou run on a treadmill, using the last carrot in the house as bait. But the Lemmings absolutely want his carrot to make the perfect snowman.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers in shock that the TV has been replaced with a trompe-l’oeil image. Furious, he flushes the Lemmings out of their hiding place where they’d hoped to watch their favorite cartoon in peace and propels them as far as possible. They land in an ancient cave where a powerful spirit capable of entering individuals is asleep. The Lemmings decide to free the spirit and send it to Grizzy. But will they be able to control the spirit?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Not easy to enjoy a DVD about salmon when the Lemmings are having a disco party right there. Grizzy sends them packing with such force that they land at the research station, where they discover a state-of-the-art U.V. cabin. When turned up to the max, the light therapy and music options can advantageously replace the disco equipment Grizzy destroyed. The noise they make causes a block of ice to break off. It hurdles down the slope to the cabin and destroys Grizzy’s TV. But it doesn’t take the bear long to figure out that the U.V. cabin also has a DVD function.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun destroying ice towers. When Grizzy sees them, it inspires him to sculpt statues of himself. The Lemmings cannot resist the temptation to destroy the statues of Grizzy, who does everything in his power to protect them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A container adrift along the icefield will change the lives of Grizzy and the Lemmings: it’s an inexhaustible stock of chocolate spread! There is so much, that for the first time the close enemies have no need to fight over the treat. They entice a flock of penguins into hoisting the container out of the water. One of the penguins, who did not get his reward in fish, is disgruntled. Grizzy has him taste the Yummy, then throws the jar far away to get rid of the penguin. The chocolate treat spreads over the icefield. Fatal error?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses a fire extinguisher to chase the Lemmings from the living room so that he can take a nap, but the gadget accidentally flies out the window. It lands at the top of an ice cliff, causing a fissure, and the peak of the cliff topples. Amid the debris, the Lemmings discover a fearsome creature: the Yeti, who is looking for the guilty party. The Lemmings bring him to Grizzy, never dreaming that the giant will immediately fall in love with the Ranger’s cabin and throw a very original party.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are bored. A coconut rolls over to Grizzy’s feet, pulling the bear out of his state of torpor. He imagines a sort of face on the nut and decides to care for it, like a child with its doll. He has so much fun playing with his new toy that the Lemmings want to join in. But when the bear refuses, the Lemmings ruse: they hide inside other coconuts in hopes of being adopted by Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While bickering with the Lemmings over control of the TV, Grizzy sees an illustration that gives him an idea. In a medical book, a person whose leg is in a cast is being served dinner in front of a TV. Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle and shows the Lemmings the patient care illustrations. The imaginary invalid Grizzy is so convincing that the Lemmings fall for the trick. They think that the sooner Grizzy is healed, the sooner they will be able to throw him out of the cabin as planned.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the beach, the Lemmings have set up a mini funfair for tourists. Each attraction lets you to win tickets, which are then used to collect prizes from a vending machine. Grizzy, who is not very good at games of skill, steals the tickets collected by the Lemmings in order to obtain the jackpot. The Lemmings decide to create an attraction just for him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes ‘man overboard’ and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesn’t have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises it’s a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesn’t go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesn’t have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he can’t remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine there’s only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Bean’s main concern is to get some money and get back to the baker’s before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own ‘No Littering’ signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories don’t always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers’ home-tree isn’t big enough to store all of Chep’s collections. So Chep goes all around Mushton to find a new home for them – and no way he’s letting them move out without him!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is the champ of finding Mushables in their version of ‘hide-and-seek’ – ‘Hide your Hat’. The last one he needs to find is Mushpot. But Mushpot is the champ of hiding!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: With Sumush out of town, both Mush-Mush and Fung think that they are now the strongest Mushables in Mushton. But neither of them counts on the strength of Lilit and Miff!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is super happy to have Amanita become a collector as well. Until she starts getting better at collecting than he is!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers discover a super-sticky tree sap and use it to have lots of fun… until Mush-Mush gets stuck to Muddler’s back.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After studying a magazine advertisement with a couple standing in front of an SUV Grizzy imagines that if only he had a nice car his favorite she-bear would be

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortune teller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing beach party inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy, who wishes to recover his couch, tries to straighten up, but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate, Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine... frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with, whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: it’s been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself, before selecting the appropriate foodstuffs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer to the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy, the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones, and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and won’t come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy discovers that the rangers new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages. But the Lemmings see the new gadget more as a competition bumper car.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. He will finally be able to rid of the Lemmings, without even leaving the couch!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To make sure that the Lemmings dont snatch his chocolate spread while hes taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. The Lemmings try in vain to break into the fridge until they see Grizzy open the door while sleepwalking. Unfortunately, Grizzy wakes up at the crucial moment. The Lemmings do everything possible to make him fall back asleep as quick as possible.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have invented a new popcorn game which consists of throwing popcorn and catching it with their mouths. Grizzy notices that his lovely she-bear seems to be drawn by the scent of the grilled corn and decides to invite her over for a snack, just the two of them. But first, he must quickly recover the popcorn from the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear hes in love with, for she truly adores this rhythm. He finds a learning kit at the rangers home which has a dance carpet with footprints that light up in rhythm. The only problem is that Lemmings want the ghetto-blaster to continue their rave party to an entirely different beat.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy undergoes an identity crisis after a run-in with a metal pan. Can the Lemmings help him get back to normal?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om het mysterie op te lossen van de enge Crystal Crawler - een vleermuisachtig monster - moet de gang de Crystal Canopy in - een doolhof van complexe kristalformaties. Om het nog erger te maken, kunnen ze niet praten in de Canopy, omdat zelfs het kleinste beetje geluid ervoor kan zorgen dat alle kristallen om hen heen zullen vallen.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Ondanks dat Velma een hekel heeft aan water, gaat de gang aan boord van een cruiseschip van Freds neef. Maar een waterfobie is hun minste zorg wanneer een angstaanjagend zeemonster het schip aanvalt.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song! Theyll need to learn to harmonize as a team to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave, unbeknownst to the rest of the Bat-Family.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critter’s arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders rush to build a soccer stadium in Mexico for their fast customer, Speedy Gonzalez. / As The Looney Builders help Petunia build a greenhouse, she can’t wait for the veggies to grow and does everything she can to speed up the process.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Bean’s spirits.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Beans birthday dinner is ruined when he gets a bad table and ends up sitting next to a confused movie star. After swimming in the lobster tank, Mr Bean unknowingly takes revenge in the kitchen.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells … bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Boss shows he’s still got it in the inventin’ department by coming up with a brain-swapping raygun. Just what the world needs. The Boss’ glory is short lived, though, when the raygun starts going off randomly. The Boss and Lamput trade places, and we get to see what it looks like when the worst boss in the world can also freak you out by morphing into orange stuff. Everyone’s acting topsy turvy, so it’s up to Specs and Skinny to straighten things out. Lucky those guys don’t have brains to swap.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Lamput are accidentally taken onboard an alien spaceship! Before the aliens start experimenting on them, they have to find a way to escape. Thank goodness, Skinny and Boss come to the rescue but Specs and Lamput to figure out how to use an alien teleporter. Will they be able to do it before the aliens find them?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Mr. Moustache is on a romantic date with Miss Lipstick during Loi Krathong festival (the famous annual Thailands light festival), an event that nothing must go wrong! However, the Docs and their chase with Lamput keeps getting in the way of the the lovers perfect night out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzys TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. This is a case of absolute urgency!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up for he has no intention of taking any risks! But he hadnt reckone

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Little Quacker is heartsick and hes come to the cat and mouse detective to help mend his broken heart. You see, the duck fell in love at first quack with a bird he met luxuriating in the central park pond. The courtship went south (literally) when Quackers honey coo-coo migrated with her flock. All that Quacker has left of her is a single feather and hes counting on the cat and mouse detective to find his one true love. Prince Charming had an easier time finding Cinderella with a glass slipper, but Tom and Jerry arent about to fly the coop. In the end, they find the owner of the lost feather and reunite the two lovebirds who fly off into the sunset...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

Butch and Tom go toe-to-toe for the honor. But when Tom manages to nab the spot, he winds up disappearing, too! Now its up to Jerry to solve the case!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick’s required not to eat or drink for 12 hours.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toms being unusually difficult when hes rocked by an epiphany -- hes losing his hair! Paranoid hes going to become a hairless cat, Tom will do anything Jerry tells him to do in order to regrow it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover, however, that Velma lacks the skillset to make her a popular politician!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a birthday piñata in the rangers living room. The idea of bursting open a papier-mâche statue with a bat like it says in the instructions pleases him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell. But since the object was found in the trash, he needs to wash it first. And the Lemmings are using the sole bar of soap in the house as a bobsleigh.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange American Indian figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
