programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers lead Sushi-Mushi to believe that Pickled Swampost is Mushpot’s favourite dish when he cant stand it. Now they must try to stop Sushi-Mushi from serving this horrible food to Mushpot!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is the only Mushable who cant bend a small branch back to catapult himself between two trees. He feels weak and embarrassed. But when strength doesnt work, Chep realizes that its all in the technique!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that oysters can make pearls almost instantaneously: just put an object inside their shell and it’s automatically coated with mother-of-pearl The game of marbles that the Lemmings have invented with pearls is driving Grizzy crazy. He manages to catapult the Lemmings far away. But at the ocean bottom, they discover a giant oyster. All they need to create a giant-scale marble game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have adopted a small exotic fish that’s lively and affectionate and have fun decorating its aquarium. Jealous, Grizzy finds a fish too, but his is expressionless and indifferent to the bear’s efforts to communicate. Grizzy plots to exchange the two fish behind the Lemmings backs. He puts the affectionate fish in an even bigger aquarium with a pharaonic decor and locks the lid. But the Lemmings have no intention of leaving their friend to Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings use all the cans and tins they can get their hands on to build a beach slide. Grizzy, annoyed at not finding his tinned fish to prepare his meal tray, recovers them from the Lemmings. In their struggle, Grizzy loses his badge! Grizzy and the Lemmings now fight over a valuable metal detector that each party needs to accomplish their goal: build a slide or find the beloved badge.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take a liking to an endangered crab on the beach and decide to shelter it from a seagull who is using its shell to open coconuts. They bring it home to a disgruntled Grizzy, who wants to watch TV in peace while snacking on Cheetos. When the Lemmings turn into full-fledged crab rescuers, the house is soon overrun with crustaceans. Grizzy decides to use the seagull to get rid of the crabs. But the Lemmings - ready to do anything to protect their new friends - embark the entire house, like a raft on water.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play pirates on a beached boat. Grizzy, who is fishing further down, realizes that with the Lemmings’ boat, he could come closer to a zone that’s teeming with fish. Grizzy takes a malicious pleasure playing pirate himself to unseat the Lemmings and steal their boat. The Lemmings discover a chest containing real pirate belongings. A telescope conjures the owner’s ghost who immediately places his saber and hook at their disposal.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance that’s even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams of drinking some nice cold coconut milk on the couch. Step one, get rid of the Lemmings who are having fun flying through the living room. Two, find coconuts that havent been emptied of their nectar. While Grizzy struggles to pick coconuts that are too high up, the Lemmings find a magic conch. By simply dusting yourself with its sand, you can fly! It doesnt take Grizzy long to figure this out and the bear rapidly imagines himself as Peter Pan sipping on his easily-harvested coconut milk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV in peace. The Lemmings have other plans: they want to have fun playing music with homemade instruments. Exasperated by the racket theyre making in the garage, Grizzy destroys the instruments and sends the Lemmings flying. The Lemmings discover a magic ukulele that bewitches anyone who hears its music: the perfect tool to regain control of the cabin and get back to their concert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant sleep because its too hot. He decides to confiscate the fans the Lemmings use to power their fake spaceship. Totally into their Space Opera game, the Lemmings try to repel the alien Grizzy with laser party favors and are propelled onto an unknown planet: a volcano crater with a secret base where a rocket is ready to take off. The rocket carries the cabin into space. Its no longer a game: Grizzy and the Lemmings will have to face the dangers of outer space!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one that’s perfect but is outraged when he’s told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers he’s one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find it’s closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his ‘princess’. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero ‘Super Spy’ and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers’ house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When things go missing from everyone’s home-trees, our Mushlers get on the case to catch the culprit.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Morel notices a Mushlet who is too shy to join in with the others. He realizes why the Mushlet is so shy -- they are in awe of Mush-Mush. Morel gets Mush-Mush to boost the Mushlets confidence.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep discovers he is great at giving snails massages. But the Food and Travel Snails now want massages all the time. Exhausting! Chep has to learn how to tell them NO!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush goes on an adventure with Morel and Sushi-Mushi. He worries he wont be cool enough to fit in with the older Mushables, so makes Chep come along for support.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves dancing. The only Mushable she hasn’t danced with is Amanita. But Amanita doesn’t dance. Can Lilit get her dancing?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine, but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch their favorite program. While looking for a backup zapper, they happen onto a top secret Canadian Army prototype that enables you to apply the usual controls: play, pause and fast forward to living beings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up… a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wicket’s nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks he’s just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the Lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied break dance the Lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, its panic all round! Grizzy is determined to eliminate the parasites, down to the very last one. The problem is his little roommates have no desire whatsoever to be treated...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Another heat wave: even the riverbed is dried up. One very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the Lemmings have used the last remaining bottles of water to fill their inflatable pool. He has no intention of letting the Lemmings swim in what might very well be his last chance to quench his thirst.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have caught a little spider. Her sticky threads are perfect for bungee jumping. Grizzy, who has no intention of getting caught in the web, decides to crush the insect.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. Indeed, next to the supermarket are two jackpot-style machines with slots the size of the lids. But more importantly, theres a key to be won that makes you eligible for the grand prize... the giant jar of Yummy on display under a glass cover.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner to eat in front of his favorite series. But his moment of pleasure is abruptly interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy rapidly discovers that the true interference is the Lemmings, who are using the TV antenna as a diving board for their water games.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om het mysterie op te lossen rondom een spookachtige artiest die ronddwaalt in haar voormalige concerthal, moet de gang doen alsof ze een rockband zijn! Maar kunnen ze de zaak oplossen voor dat Velma het podium op moet en moet zingen?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred is excited to visit The Vault - a high security prison from which no convict has ever escaped. But when the ghost of Stealing Stan (JOHN DiMAGGIO), an inmate who always claimed to be innocent, terrorizes the prison, Fred has to solve the mystery and rethink his stance on criminal justice!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Jestah injures herself preparing for an extreme sports competition with the other Zoomers, Bibi helps her overcome her fear of going to the mechanic so she can heal up in time to compete.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buffs trusty winch is knocked out of action by Poison Ivy, he must learn to improvise and come up with creative solutions on the fly.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Ma and Pa Bear to build a bedroom for their son, Junior, whose excitement causes setbacks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders help Wile E. Coyote build a telescope to view the Looney Moon, Tweety must face his fear of the dark. / The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about doing funny voices.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: During a visit to Londons National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean fears daft films about giant cats, blobs, and tiny dancing men. A trip to the cinema sends his imagination wild with hilarious, scary tricks.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of… doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n’ span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, it’s chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a beautiful start to a beautiful day, a sudden storm cuts the fun short and the Docs have to go home. Lamput accidentally gets taken home with them. As always, Lamput makes himself at home. No one is the wiser until the next morning. It’s time for Skinny and Specs to go into full on detective mode and to find out who or what is in their house. Can Lamput make a run for it before they find him?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar proof safe.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Its hot out and when Grizzy sees an ice cream commercial on TV, he has a sudden craving. Unfortunately, the Lemmings made it to the deep-freeze in the garage before him and emptied it out to make themselves a sled run in the backyard with strawberry-vanilla ice cream. For Grizzy, theres no question that the stock they possessively watch over in an icebox winds up as powder snow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon... which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment. Starving, Grizzy decides to melt the ice with the blow-dryer. Only the Lemmings are already using it for their latest rocket game in the piping system.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. They have a blast straddling these fabulous toys, swirling in every which direction, but their new game is not really compatible with a bears nap.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A little cat and mouse leads Jerry to take refuge in his hole in the wall where he runs into Franky Two-Face the rat, who now calls Jerry’s home, his home.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After another destructive bout of cat and mouse, Hildie and Beatie decide that Toms bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment! With a flick of the wand, Tom becomes a doting cat. Much better!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom is replaced by Meathead, Jerrys superior intelligence is no match for Meatheads dumb luck.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom to chases Jerry into the local Natural History Museum.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerrys investigation reveals some kitty criminals!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Like a big brother should, Jerry must get a sleepy Tuffy out of bed, make them both breakfast, get Tuffy cleaned up, put on his backpack and get him past the mean cat to the house next door.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Gotham’s annual dog show is tonight, and Harley plans to compete for the prized “Best in Show” ribbon. Sensing she’s up to no good, Robin decides to enter rough-and-tumble Ace the Bat-Dog to keep an eye on the thieving trickster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: A very bad parking choice on Freds part leads the gang to an asteroid mining base in outer space where an alien virus appears to be infecting the crew one by one, turning them into evil skull-headed aliens. The paranoid, terrified gang must try to solve the mystery before the virus reaches them, as well – if it hasnt already!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om een sneeuwstorm te ontwijken checkt de groep in bij een eng enorm hotel wat geleid wordt door een man die erg strikt is over de regels die opgesteld zijn door zijn overleden moeder. De groep komt erachter dat de straf voor een overtreding uitgevoerd wordt door de geest van de overleden moeder zelf.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wicket’s garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divya’s driving skills so take the karts for a “proper” race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Whilst trying to stop the Lemmings from playing with a crate of firework rockets Grizzy is literally carried away with them when the largest specimen shoots off

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share, Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. Amidst the debris, they discover a strange pack: an army tent with all the necessary equipment to recreate a home in nature. Its the chance to discover the joys of camping in the wild.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables embedded piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it. They spray a bit of the water of youth onto Grizzy and he instantly turns into a harmless cub they can easily rid themselves of. But the effects of the waters are only temporary.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings... clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take the scouts on a camping trip to canyon country and get more than they bargained for when a coyote pup shows up.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The gang get more than they bargained for when they try to shoo away a seemingly docile spider.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A Tom and Jerry chase through Postlewaite Manor results in major injuries to Cates which places his defense of the Butlers Linen Gloves Boxing Title in jeopardy.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom guards Maudes prize pumpkin until it is time for her to enter it into the local fairs big competition.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger forget Toms birthday the tomcat moves in with the one person who appreciates him the local Zoos gorilla Cuddles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Papa tells his fractured version of the Tom Thumb story to the Bavarian mouse trio.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: There has been a wave of sock thefts from the local laundromat and the Cat and Mouse Detectives have been hired by Pontius Pig to solve the case before his laundry business goes belly up.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A prehistoric Cave Cat arrives at Rick and Gingers House.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - Titanic. Now he simply has to park the car. But when youre Mr Bean, nothings simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid? After destroying his landlady’s back garden, Mr. Bean tries out his hand-made contraption in the woods. He is overjoyed to discover a buried chest of gold doubloons. However, his happiness is soon thwarted by the arrival of two baddies, the police and a very angry Landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. Can Bibi get free in time to unmask the imposter and save the day?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix, the Batwheels zoom into action to ensure the race is won the right way - fair and square !

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Green Arrow and his Arrowplane, Goldie, come to help Batman take on the Riddler. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around that she brings Goldie to life and the two become BFFs. But when Goldie eventually has to leave, Batwing learns that saying goodbye doesnt always mean forever!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by the town’s volunteer firefighters to build a fire truck. Duty calls and they build on the go as they make rescues throughout Looneyburg.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Witch Hazel hires The Looney Builders to make her house look spooky for Halloween, but things get complicated when they use her off-limits magical things.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch their favorite program. While looking for a backup zapper, they happen onto a top secret Canadian Army prototype that enables you to apply the usual controls: play, pause and fast forward to living beings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs And Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Lamput are accidentally taken onboard an alien spaceship! Before the aliens start experimenting on them, they have to find a way to escape. Thank goodness, Skinny and Boss come to the rescue but Specs and Lamput to figure out how to use an alien teleporter. Will they be able to do it before the aliens find them?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Mr. Moustache is on a romantic date with Miss Lipstick during Loi Krathong festival (the famous annual Thailands light festival), an event that nothing must go wrong! However, the Docs and their chase with Lamput keeps getting in the way of the the lovers perfect night out.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Eating too many sweets gives Bean a terrible toothache, and when all other attempts at curing it are exhausted, he reluctantly visits the dreaded dentist.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom gets Spike sent to obedience school and Jerry is left without a protector. When Spike returns Tom tries hard to get Spike to revert to his old ways. Jerry fights back to make sure that Spike keeps his cool.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters, but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive, he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is enjoying his bath time while Jerry bathes Tuffy. Tuffy ends up floating off in a bubble and lands in Toms bath. Jerry throws in all of the bath bombs creating a massive amount of bubbles. In the end, they all work together to get clean.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick buys Ginger a brand new mattress with a lot of high tech features. Tom is under strict orders to never sleep on it, but Butch convinces him to try it out. Jerry uses the controls against them and soon that mattress is out of control and destroys the entire house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry get a taste of the great outdoors on their camping trip to Yosemite. Tom tries hard to get some relaxation but nature and all its inhabitants, including bears, get in his way.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired to find a missing priceless Maltese Pigeon.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom enlists the help of the lake monster to terrorize the mouse village forcing Jerry Van Mouseling to intervene and save the day.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Mice visitors from Mars force Tom to change the way he treats Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom must compete with his American cousin for the right to remain a Butler at Postlewaite manor.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom inadvertently set a Yeti loose on the town, Jerry Van Mouseling must subdue the beast.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom turns into a Blob monster, and proceeds to eat everything in sight – including the village mice! Jerry Van Mouseling to the rescue!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is enjoying his bath time while Jerry bathes Tuffy. Tuffy ends up floating off in a bubble and lands in Toms bath. Jerry throws in all of the bath bombs creating a massive amount of bubbles. In the end, they all work together to get clean.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger leave town with instructions for Tom to keep the house in order, but Jerrys got other ideas.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Madcap slapstick and mayhem as the celebrated cat and mouse plot against each other.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is tricked into helping an evil magician capture all of the mice in the village but Jerry Van Mouseling foils the magicians plans.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike leaves Tom in charge of his boy Tyke only to discover upon his return that Tyke now behaves more like a cat than a dog.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom falls into a manhole and finds a magic cloak that turns him into King of the Catacombs.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom, forced into driving a race car created by evil Dr. Otto, terrorizes the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling comes to their rescue.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Fosse Ferret hires The Looney Builders to build a stage for the kids’ dance recital. / It’s Taz’s birthday, so The Looney Builders build him a huge ice cream sundae.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pete Puma hires The Looney Builders to build a roller disco for Looneyburg. Lola is new to roller skating, but doesn’t want to take it slow and practice.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Petunia’s Grandpa Oink to upgrade his farm. They take things too far, and Grandpa Oink misses some of the things he loves most about farming.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build an outer space ball court on Mars. Bugs is a big fan of the sport, and soon becomes a ball and build “hog.”

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam when hes in a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her as a Batwheel - if he can convince her to stop playing long enough to focus on their mission!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi wishes she could live a rule-free life like Jestah, so she decides to only focus on having fun instead. But when her actions put Batgirl in danger, Bibi must put the fun aside to stop Harley and save her hero.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give Buff the nickname Tough Buff. But Buff abruptly bristles at the name, leading the Batwheels to realize that its not okay to call your friends nicknames that they dont like.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song! Theyll need to learn to harmonize as a team to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave, unbeknownst to the rest of the Bat-Family.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Jestah injures herself preparing for an extreme sports competition with the other Zoomers, Bibi helps her overcome her fear of going to the mechanic so she can heal up in time to compete.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and won’t come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: It seems like Starmush is the only one who can answer Mush-Mushs difficult questions. But Starmush lives so far away in the Dark Forest! Mush-Mush hatches a plan to get Starmush to move to Mushton, so he can get answers right here at home.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit remembers loving balancing on a slack-vine when she was a Mushlet. But actually, she never really learnt how, so she keeps falling off and getting really frustrated.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep and Mush-Mush sometimes don’t listen to Lilit. So when she tries to tell them about her great idea to have a special firefly night, they instead believe it is their idea. Grrr! Whose special firefly night will come out on top?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Bolly hurts his foot and can’t go fast until it heals. Phooey! But when everyone gives him treats to cheer him up, Bolly decides he never wants his foot to heal.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is over-joyed when his weevil friend, Chase, returns to Mushton. But Chase seems to have changed, hes way harder to handle now. And he wants something from Chep! But what?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has to give the Mushlets a talk about spiders. But talking in front of a group makes Chep nervous. Mush-Mush offers to do it instead. Problem is Mush-Mush’s knowledge of spiders is so bad he ends up getting caught by one!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a racket game linked to a prize distributor on a gas station parking lot. The more times you hit the ball without letting it touch the ground, the bigger the prize. With a series of 1,000 consecutive exchanges, the prize is a giant jar of Yummy chocolate spread! Grizzy has no qualms about cheating to win, but the outcome against the Lemmings is never certain. For they have nerves of steel when the stakes are high.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses insecticide and a fly swatter to get rid of vermin that are bothering him during his siesta. The Lemmings heal his last victim: a cute little insect they adopt as their house pet. Only problem, their starving mascot only eats wood! The cabin has lots of it, but when Grizzy realizes that an insect is eating his home from the inside, he takes drastic measures to eliminate it permanently.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is too hot and proposes the Lemmings an exchange: their ventilator, which they use to propel their skateboard in the air, for a baby ostrich Grizzy found outside the cabin and who can tow them. The Lemmings are delighted to play with their new baby friend who is overflowing with energy. But the baby’s parents have a different outlook and do not want their son taking risks. Thinking that Grizzy is the Lemmings’ father, they hold him accountable.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has played for too many hours on the console. His eyes are so fatigued he cannot stand a single ray of light. The Lemmings choose this very moment to throw a big birthday party with as many lights as possible! Grizzy goes to great lengths to settle the issue and decides to trip the power supply. The Lemmings discover a source of magical light deep in the savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings play Hide-n-Seek and cannot refrain from sabotaging their game by revealing their hiding places. The Lemmings challenge him to play against them. The two sides outdo each other in cunning and trickery, but they are equally good. For the last decisive round, the opponents decide to extend the game zone to the entire savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have organized a mega party at the cabin. This is obviously not to Grizzy’s liking and the bear throws them out. The Lemmings discover a cave where the party is even more fun, but their ruckus drives out the bats who seek refuge in the cabin. Terrified of them, Grizzy tries everything to get rid of them and understands that the most effective thing is the Lemmings’ ghetto blaster.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs the fridge to keep his fish cold, but the Lemmings want it to make ice for their miniature ice skating rink. When Grizzy finds a new model robot air conditioner that is both rapid and efficient, the problem seems to be solved: each party will have their own source of cold. But when the Lemmings activate the robot’s artificial intelligence, the gadget starts to feel a powerful love for the person who resembles him most in his new surroundings: the fridge. Grizzy and the Lemmings will do everything to break up this budding romance and recover the cold sources that are rightfully theirs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoo’s refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedia’s instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings’ hard rock concert is driving Grizzy mad. After kicking them out, Grizzy requisitions their ghetto blaster and listens to a relaxation cassette to calm down. The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree whose engraved strips of bark cast targeted maledictions. To recover their material, the Lemmings decide to drive Grizzy out by cursing him with the Ten Plaques of the Savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine, Grizzy decides to redo the cabin’s interior design. To make sure everything is perfect, he ousts the Lemmings and their electric train. By chance, the Lemmings discover an underground futuristic premises in the middle of the savanna. From this secret place, they can see the entire savanna on a giant screen, down to the very inside of Grizzy’s cabin just like in a sandbox video game. By using the menus, they can have an impact on reality and thus... on Grizzy!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.desc: Karen Tso presents highlights from CNBC’s coverage of the 2025 IMF and World Bank Group Annual Meetings in Washington DC where conversations focused on the global economy, the impact of geopolitical and trade uncertainty as well as well as the transformational potential of AI.

programme.title: CNBC Explains
programme.desc: ‘CNBC Explains’ is a dynamic explainer series that dives deep into the forces shaping our world. Each episode unpacks complex business and economic topics, breaking them down into clear, compelling narratives. With expert insights, data-driven visuals and a global perspective, this series helps viewers understand not just what is happening, but why it matters.

programme.title: Spirit of Yachting
programme.desc: This 46th edition starts and finishes in Malta’s historic capital Valetta, with over 600 nautical miles of challenging sailing in between. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun isoisa kertoo Finiakselle ja Ferbille merirosvolegendasta, joka liittyy jarveen talon vierella, lapset lahtevat meriseikkailulle. Candace nielee vahingossa oranssia sammalta ja nakee kummallisia nakyja, kuten etta Perry ja tri Tollontyo metkuilevat taas. / Autolla ajamisen opettelu saa Candacen kauhusta kankeaksi, joten Finias ja Ferb paattavat auttaa pelon voittamisessa luomalla mahdollisimman turvallisen ja Candace-varman ajoneuvon, jolla harjoitella: monsteriauton. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: On kesaloman viimeinen paiva ja Finias ja Ferb paattavat kayttaa paivan parhaalla mahdollisella tavalla. Valitettavasti Candacelle se tarkoittaa sita, etta se on hanen viimeinen tilaisuutensa saada veljensa kiinni… vai onko? Kun Candacen viimeinen yritys menee pilalle ennen aamiaista, han paattaa toistaa paivan kaynnistamalla Tollontyon Toisto-inatoorin. Silla valin kun muut eivat tieda mitaan, Candace ja Tollontyo toistavat paivaa kerta toisensa jalkeen, ja lisaavat taten tilaisuuksia saada pojat kiinni itse teosta. Pahat seuraukset saavat Candacen ja Tollontyon miettimaan, mika todella on tarkeaa.

programme.title: Heartbeat

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby
programme.desc: Giles Coren ja Monica Galetti reisivad Newfoundlandi tillukesele saarele, kus traditsioonilise kalastamise kadumisel on elanikel tulnud leida uued tookohad. 1990. aastatel kolisid paljud pered ara, kuid uus hotell on andnud tood ning aidanud hoida elus vanu tavasid ja neid kulastajatele tutvustada.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Ida-Virumaal on tehismagedesse kuhjatud enam kui miljard tonni põlevkivitoostuse jaatmeid, mis peidavad endas potentsiaalselt vaartuslikku toorainet erinevatele toostusharudele. Millised võiks olla nende kasutusvõimalused? Tõsine uleilmne probleem on ka tekstiilijaatmete rohkus, mille ringlussevõtu võimalused on kesised. Kasutatud ja katkised tekstiilid jõuavad sageli arengumaadesse, kus koormavad kogukondi ning põhjustavad keskkonnareostust. Uurime Keenias, millist koostood teevad eestlased kohalikega, et tekstiiljaatmete probleemile leevendust tuua. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Planeedipaastjad
programme.desc: Pakendivaba elu praktiseeriva Karini koju kolivad sisse uued tookad abilised. Taaraveoga karastunud Kalle harjutab igapaevaste kaikude tegemist jalgrattaga. Kõike seda ikka planeedi paastmise ullal eesmargil. Saatejuht Kadi Jaanisoo-Kuld, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Marit Ummelas, produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Metslased
programme.desc: Metslaste teekond Põhja-Kõrvemaal muutub jarjest maalilisemaks. Ligemargadena oleme jõudnud Soesauna tallu, kus teeme koos perenaise Ljudmillaga Ivan Tšaid. Meiega liituvad uued metslased Kairi ja Jarek. Lapime varustust ja tahistame juubelit. Osasid tabab seenehullus. Jussi jarvede juures teeb Asso Kommer meile ringkaigu “metsaaias” ja saame teada, mida metsast hada korral suhu pista. Lisaks uusi tarkusi loodusest ja kasulikke matkanippe. Sarja autor Lemo.

programme.title: Eesti lood
programme.desc: Metsloomad on hadas. Aladel, kus on alati olnud mets, laiuvad nuud uued elamurajoonid, lõputudmagistraalid ja lagedad polugoonid. Inimtegevuse tagajarjel satuvad loomad uha sagedaminiõnnetustesse. Vigastatud ja orvuks jaanud metsaelanikel on veel lootust, sest vabatahtlikudMetsloomauhingust võtavad nad oma hoole alla, ravivad terveks ning lasevad tagasi loodusesse.Režissoor Meelis Muhu. Tootja Umberto And KO.

programme.title: Suus sulav Eesti
programme.desc: Angelica Udekull sõidab labi Viljandi ja Mulgimaa. Kas tõesti on mulk musta kuuega ihne tuup nagu raagib Trad. Attacki trummar Tõnu Tubli? Õpime tegema õigesti mulgiputru ja mulgikorpi ning kuulame Naised Koogis naiste mahlakaid jutte. Saatejuht Angelica Udekull, toimetaja Robert Kõrvits, montaažirežissoor Vladlen Pobjaržin, produtsent Laura Kõrvits.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Maria ja Henry uurivad Tiinalt ratsepaameti kohta. Alma keelab Haraldil Lainet kosida. Mare kulastab Jaanust. Annelit huvitab Are korter.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: Maahommik randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just Maahommiku saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Varastatud lootus: Armukelm
programme.desc: Naiste omavahelised suhted pannakse proovile, kui Tarmo vastu sepistatud plaan ei lahe nii libedalt kui loodetud. Signe ja Eleri on juba alla andmas, kuid Mariliisi kindlameelsus ning hulljulgus on muutunud omaette manguks. Kas on võimalik, et Tarmo ei markagi, et seekord mangitakse hoopis temaga? Osades Mart Avandi, Tiina Tauraite, Liina Vahtrik, Mirtel Pohla, Indrek Sammul, Gert Raudsep jpt. Idee autor ja režissoor Tambet Tuisk, operaator-lavastaja Ants Martin Vahur. Stsenaristid Livia Ulman, Andris Feldmanis ja Tambet Tuisk. Produtsent Jaan Laugamõts.

programme.title: Tippvormi(s)
programme.desc: Kas kolme kuuga on võimalik oma kesist vormi parandada ja sooritada kaitsevae kehaliste võimete kontrolltest? Seekord võõrustab meid Merevagi - osalejad pannakse proovile vesikeskkonnas, tuleb ujuda, sukelduda ja kanda rasket tuukrivarustust. Saame tuttavaks ka Merevae koogipoolega ja osalejad peavad auravate katelde taga valmistama toitu 700 naljasele. Saatejuht ja produtsent Kaidor Kahar, treenerid Eneli Kutter ja Siim Tõnisson. Režissoor Tarvo Tammeoks, toimetaja Heleri All, monteerija Alar Nilov.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: Kaheosaline dokumentaal, mis jutustab, kuidas nõukogude ajal Eesti NSV naiste murdmaakoondise juures alustanud usinast ja uuenduslikust eesti treenerist sai rahvusvahelise murdmaasuusatamise uks mõjukam ning tuntum spetsialist, kes tõstis sportlasi olumpiapjedestaalidele, aga havitas ka karjaare. Ta palvis tunnustust, auhindu ja kiitust, aga pettis samal ajal keeruliste kombinatsioonidega dopingukontrolle, sponsoreid ning spordisõpru. Mati Alaver - valgusest varju on traagiline lugu poorasest vaimustusest ja rangast pettumusest, mille telgitagustes peitub palju pooltoone ning fakte, mida uldsus esimest korda kuuleb. Autor-stsenarist Mihkel Karmas, režissoorid Raivo Maripuu, Vladlen Pobjaržin, toimetajad Kristjan Pihl, Taavi Eilat, Merilin Parli, Uljana Kuzmina, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Maa, mis laulab
programme.desc: “Maa, mis laulab” on hammastav muusikaline eepos, mis toob ekraanile Lati rahvusliku arkamisaja vastupanu vaimu. Aastal 1873, vaid neli aastat parast esimest eestlaste laulupidu ja inspireerituna selle edust, korraldasid Noorlatlaste vaprad mehed rõhuva tsensuuri valvsa pilgu all esimest korda Lati laulupidu

programme.title: Keelekild
programme.desc: Mismoodi on meie emakeel ajas muutunud ja arenenud? Millist eesti keelt võidi kõnelda kaks tuhat aastat tagasi kunnipaeva varahommikul? Millist 370 aastat tagasi ulestõusmispuha õhtusoogi ajal või 1970. aastate naistepaeval? Millist eesti keelt raagime tana? Teksti autorid Annika Viht, Tiina Laansalu ja Tiina Paet. Naitlejad Hilje Murel, Mart Avandi, Helina Tuur, Herman Avandi. Režissoor Rene Vilbre. Keelekillud on valminud Eesti Rahvusringhaalingui ja Eesti Keele Instituudi koostoona. Tana on emakeelepaev.

programme.title: Hercule Poirot
programme.desc: Olles lasknud end tussata kuulsal kunstivargal Marrascaudl, otsustab masendunud Poirot aidata oma autojuhil leida kadunud armsamat. Otsingud viivad ta Šveitsi, kuhu saatuse tahtel oodatakse sedasama Marrascaud. Üksildases magihotellis kohtub Poirot taas kord krahvinnaga, kelle ta oli kunagi politsei kaest paastnud. Peagi saab talle selgeks, et kuulus meistervaras peab olema juba hotelli kulastajate seas.

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: Õhku hingavad imetajad on valja mõelnud erakordseid viise, kuidas hakkama saada eluga vees, alates veesilmadest vihmametsas kuni pimedate ookeanisugavusteni.

programme.title: Pea ees vette. Tai Kuningriigis
programme.desc: Viimases osas lahevad Milderid kulla Gordon Ramsayd ja Jamie Oliveri nõustanud kokandusõpetajale, kes juhendab, kuidas valmistada ehtsat pad thaid. Lisaks kulastatakse Põhja-Tais asuvat Tham Luangi koobast, mis jõudis 2018. aastal uleilmsetesse uudistesse, kui kohalik jalgpallipoiste meeskond sinna ootamatult tekkinud uputuse tõttu 18 paevaks lõksu jai. Selgub ka, kus asub Taimaa absoluutselt kõige ilusam rand! Toimetaja Piret Jarvis-Milder, režissoor Egert Milder. Tootja Kaks Vulkaani OÜ.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Eesti mang
programme.desc: Kaes on jarjekordne Eesti mangu poolfinaal, kus kohtuvad kolme eelneva saate võitjad - laskesuusataja Johanna Taliharm, Vanemuise naitleja Veiko Porkanen ja Vabamu juht Ivo Lille. Saadet juhib alati heatujuline Gaute Kivistik.

programme.title: Saaremaal on zoo
programme.desc: Risto ja Mirge jagavad uue loodusmaja valmimise teekonda ja tapsustavad, mida neil on plaanis seal korraldama hakata. Risto tutvustab panterkameeleoni ja selgitab, milline on sisalike pidamiseks vajalik keskkond. Mirge isa Aimur raagib, mida ta arvab noorte loomaaiapidamisest ja paljastab, kellelt on Mirge parinud oma sportlikkuse ning ettevõtlikkuse. Mirge esitleb vaatajatele kaabussiile Tiitu ja Millit. Loomaaias toimub suvehooaja lõpupidu tootajate ja perega. Mirge võtab hooaja kokku ja jagab tanusõnu kõigile, kes neid sel kiirel ajal abistasid. Saate tegijad Hannes Raimla ja Pilleli Laets, tootja Pilleli And Hannes / PH TEIK OÜ.

programme.title: Mehed, hakkame elama!
programme.desc: Kuus julget Eesti meest otsustasid oma tervise tõsiselt kasile võtta. Tervisesaate teises osas maadleb oma suure pahega ooperilaulja Oliver Kuusik. 30 aastat suitsetamist on Oliveri vererõhu lakke ajanud ja võhma havitanud. Saatejuht Kaidor Kahar, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Teet Teder ja produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Jurka tahab Haraldi Laine majast valja visata. Alma kulastab koos konstaabel Torimiga Taivot. Margna sõimab Oliver-Steni ja Margitit halva valimiskampaania eest. Mare soovib Allanit intervjueerida.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport. Sport
programme.desc: Sport. Sport

programme.title: Varastatud lootus: Armukelm
programme.desc: Suure armuskeemi finaal loob naistel jalad alt. Telefonidele ei vastata, raha ei ole kusagil, reisikott on pakitud. Siis aga selgub Mariliisi suurejoonelise plaani finaal. Tarmo, Mariliis, Signe, Eleri – kes valjub armukelmi mangust võitjana? Osades Mart Avandi, Tiina Tauraite, Liina Vahtrik, Mirtel Pohla, Indrek Sammul, Gert Raudsep jpt. Idee autor ja režissoor Tambet Tuisk, operaator-lavastaja Ants Martin Vahur. Stsenaristid Livia Ulman, Andris Feldmanis ja Tambet Tuisk. Produtsent Jaan Laugamõts.

programme.title: John Cranko
programme.desc: Kui koreograaf John Cranko 1960. aastal Londonist Stuttgarti lavastama saabub, ei aima ta veel, et see reis muudab ta elu. Karismaatilise Cranko uuendusliku koreograafiaga algab tahelend balletimaailma tippu, kuid ka mehe elustiil aratab provintslikus keskkonnas tahelepanu: ta suitsetab balletisaalis, joob liiga palju ja armastab, keda tahab. Ent ka edujoovastuses pole uksindusest ja nukrusest paasu, kuni tingimatu armastus tantsu ja oma trupi vastu viib liiga varase traagilise surmani. R: Joachim Lang. O: Sam Riley, Marti Fernandez Paixa jt.

programme.title: Eestlanna Pariisis
programme.desc: Inimsuhete draama Pariisis elavast kahest eesti naisest. Eesti vaikelinnast parit naisel avaneb võimalus teha tood Pariisi kesklinnas, hooldades suitsiidikalduvusega vanaprouat. Üksildase suurlinna ilmadaami ja provintsihooldaja suhe kasvab ule inimlikuks sidemeks, mis annab mõtte nende edasiseks eluks.

programme.title: The Chelsea Detective
programme.desc: Endine popstaar leitakse oma vannist uppununa. Uurimise kaigus selgub, et isegi kõige lahedasemad ei teadnud lauljanna saladust, mis talle saatuslikuks sai.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: Õhku hingavad imetajad on valja mõelnud erakordseid viise, kuidas hakkama saada eluga vees, alates veesilmadest vihmametsas kuni pimedate ookeanisugavusteni.

programme.title: Osooni lood
programme.desc: 2006. aastal sai Eesti valusa õppetunni seni kõige ulatuslikumast naftareostusest, mis meie rannikule jõudis. Toona ei osatud maardunud linde kuidagi aidata. Teeme kaasa eluslooduse reostustõrje õppuse ja selgitame, kuidas on tanaseks paranenud Eesti valmisolek selliste olukordade lahendamiseks.

programme.title: Saaremaal on zoo
programme.desc: Risto ja Mirge jagavad uue loodusmaja valmimise teekonda ja tapsustavad, mida neil on plaanis seal korraldama hakata. Risto tutvustab panterkameeleoni ja selgitab, milline on sisalike pidamiseks vajalik keskkond. Mirge isa Aimur raagib, mida ta arvab noorte loomaaiapidamisest ja paljastab, kellelt on Mirge parinud oma sportlikkuse ning ettevõtlikkuse. Mirge esitleb vaatajatele kaabussiile Tiitu ja Millit. Loomaaias toimub suvehooaja lõpupidu tootajate ja perega. Mirge võtab hooaja kokku ja jagab tanusõnu kõigile, kes neid sel kiirel ajal abistasid. Saate tegijad Hannes Raimla ja Pilleli Laets, tootja Pilleli And Hannes / PH TEIK OÜ.

programme.title: Mehed, hakkame elama!
programme.desc: Kuus julget Eesti meest otsustasid oma tervise tõsiselt kasile võtta. Tervisesaate teises osas maadleb oma suure pahega ooperilaulja Oliver Kuusik. 30 aastat suitsetamist on Oliveri vererõhu lakke ajanud ja võhma havitanud. Saatejuht Kaidor Kahar, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Teet Teder ja produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Prillitoos
programme.desc: Saatejuht Reet Linna kohtub erinevate kuulsustega

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mõnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Režissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Luhhike oppetus Eesti kultuurist
programme.desc: Kultuurisarja neljandas osas on vendadel Priit ja Mart Piusil kaed tood tais. Ära tuleb kuulata esimene Eestis ette kantud ooper, trukkida naisperele kink Martin Lutheri moodi, lasta endast valja luulehobu ja istuda Tartu Ülikooli kartsas. Abiks on Elina Nechayeva, Wimberg, Ken Ird ja paljud teised. Sarja stsenarist on Tauno Vahter, režissoor Raivo Maripuu, toimetaja Kai Vaartnõu ja kunstnik Karel Korp.

programme.title: Kirjandusministri juures. Muusika eri
programme.desc: Raamatuaasta puhul võõrustab kirjandusminister Mart Juur Eesti raamat 500 patrooni, president Alar Karist. Kord kuus raagime presidendi jaoks olulistest teostest. Tana kasitleme koos presidendi ja kulalistega Jaan Aru raamatut Ajust ja arust. Unest, teadvusest, tehisintellektist ja muust.

programme.title: Teisel pool vett
programme.desc: Dokumentaalfilm Eesti uhest kaalukaimast rokilegendist, eredalt vastuolulisest isiksusest, omaparasest ja aarmuslikust kunstnikust Urmas Alenderist, keda võib pidada meie rokkmuusika piirikiviks, ajamargiks ning kultuurisumboliks. Tema muusika pani kaasa tundma ja mõtlema, sundis kuulama nii kõlalise vaheduse kui ka tapselt sihitud sõna jõuga. Stsenarist ja reþissoor Liia Sakkos.

programme.title: Tallinn tais muusikat
programme.desc: Tallinn kannab UNESCO muusikalinna uhket tiitlit ja see annab muusikale linnaruumis erilise tahenduse. Kadri Voorand, Sissi Nylia Benita, Rasmus Puur, Kristjan Jarvi, Andres Kõpper ja Sven Grunberg viivad meid pealinna margilistesse paikadesse ning avavad oma inspiratsiooniallikad. 24. novembril on Sven Grunbergil 69. sunnipaev. Palju õnne!

programme.title: Lynley
programme.desc: Lynley avastab jõest tapetud noormehe, kellel vaenlastest puudu ei tulnud. Ent tõe jalile jõudmiseks tuleb temal ja Haversil labi murda vaikse kogukonna saladuste võrgust ja kaevata ules 18 aastat varem samas kohas toimunud surmajuhtum.

programme.title: The Chelsea Detective
programme.desc: Peenramaalt leitakse kahe tundmatu sailmed ja niidid viivad USA saatkonnani. Paraku on kõigil saatkonna tootajatel puutumatus ja tundub, et esimest korda jaab Maxil juhtum lahendamata.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: Maahommik randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just Maahommiku saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Meie õpetajad
programme.desc: Kolmandas osas kohtume Olga Nigrovskajaga – puhendunud algklasside õpetajaga, kelle too on tais empaatiat, kannatlikkust ja siirast hoolt iga lapse eest. Olga emakeel on vene keel, aga tootab ta eestikeelses koolis, kus õpetab hariduslike erivajadustega lapsi. Saatejuht Uljana Kuzmina, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Jevgenia Volohhonskaja, produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ukraina stuudio
programme.desc: USA ja Venemaa on juba mõnda aega uritanud kinniste uste taga jarjekordset Ukraina rahuplaani kokku kirjutada. Ajakirjandusse jõudnud esialgsed teated selle kohta ei tõota Ukraina jaoks midagi head. Kui keerulisse seisu see seab Kiievi, kus lisaks kogub uha enam tuure suur korruptsiooniskandaal, seda selgitab julgeolekuekspert Kristi Raik. Samal ajal on ukrainlaste seis jatkuvalt vaga keeruline Pokrovski-Mõrnohradi piirkonnas, kus venelaste surve on halastamatu. Lisaks pommitavad nad uha jõulisemalt Ukraina energiataristust ja muid tsiviilobjekte, seades ukrainlased talve eel vaga raskesse sisu. Rindesundmusi kommenteerib kindralmajor reservis Neeme Vali. Saatejuht on Epp Ehand. Toimetaja Peep Kala, režissoor Rait Roland Veskemaa, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Maailm ja mõnda
programme.desc: Kambodža on sõna otseses mõttes imede maa. Valdur Mikita mollab Angkor Wati templite ragastikus ja leiab 73 sailinud templi hulgast oma lemmikud. Kambodža kuningas Norodom Sihamon õppis Euroopas muusikat ja tantsu. Enne seda kui ta 2004. aastal kuningaks krooniti, õpetas ta Pariisis 20 aastat balletti. Kambodžas saabus 14. aprillil budausuliste uus aasta, mida tahistati kolm paeva jarjest põhiliselt pustolitest vee pritsimisega linnatanavatel. Veesõjast sai osa ka meie filmigrupp. Tonle Sapi jarv on ainulaadne selle poolest, et sellel jarvel elab 300 perekonda. Oleme kulas uhel perel, kes elab siin juba 50 aastat. Siem Reapi linna Aspara tantsuteatrisse ostsime varakult piletid ara, sest see on alati valja muudud. Kahetunnine tantsuetendus oli tõeline elamus. Kambodžas filmisid Valdur Mikita, Tiina Park ja Marianne Kõrver. Saate tootis Free Studio.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: Martha muretseb ema parast. Anne matab kurbuse ja alanduse pulmapeo ettevalmistustesse. Lagendikult leitakse Niamh Kirby, keda on noolega haavatud. Zoe teeb isa malestuseks tatoveeringu, mis Estherile sugugi ei meeldi.

programme.title: Ridade vahel
programme.desc: Siimusti on Jõgevast vaid kuue kilomeetri kaugusel asuv alev, mis on kuulus oma keraamikatootmise poolest. Vaimurahva poole pealt on Siimusti kinkinud Eestile Martin Alguse, kelle nime ette võiks panna tiitleid usna lõputult - stsenarist, naitekirjanik, dramaturg, prosaist, luuletaja, tõlkija, naitleja jne. Martin on oelnud, et kirjutamise eelduseks on lugemine - saatest saab teada, mida Martin luges, et temast nii hea kirjamees sai ja kui suurt rolli mangis tema kujunemises Siimusti, sealsed inimesed ja raamatukogu.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport. Sport
programme.desc: Sport. Sport

programme.title: Ludwig
programme.desc: John laheb uuesti jaoskonda, et saada rohkem teada Russell Carteriist, kes saabus salaparaselt umbes samal ajal, kui James kadus. Uus juhtum viib Johni ja Russelli jalutuskaigule labi Cambridge’i, kus nad seisavad silmitsi nailiselt võimatu kusimusega: miks peaks keegi tapma giidi, keda ta oli asja kohanud?

programme.title: Hercule Poirot
programme.desc: Maailmarahu toetuseks korraldatakse rahvusvaheline vastuvõtt, mille tipuks on malematš eaka vene suurmeistriga. Paraku sureb malesuurmeister otse malelaua taga ja ajakirjanduses ilmuvad lood salaparasest Suurest Nelikust. Poirotgi hakkab uurima poliitilisi telgitaguseid, kuid taipab peagi, et mõrvar tegutseb marksa isiklikumatel motiividel.

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mõnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Režissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Restoran 0
programme.desc: Restoran 0 on oma hullumeelse nadalaga jõudnud poole peale. Kokad kaisid kodus magamas ja alustavad paeva Põhjakal. Ees seisab palju tood, aga kõik ikka hea eesmargi ja toidu nimel! Saatejuhid Ott Tomik, Mart Metsallik ja Hannes Praks. Režissoor Mikk Jurjens. Produtsent Eero Reinu.

programme.title: 24 in 24: Last Chef Standing
programme.desc: Co-hosts Michael Symon and Esther Choi begin the second shift with two chefs in a head-to-head elimination battle that tests simplicity. Their assignment is to turn a basic sandwich plus three ingredients of their choosing into a fancy lunch. After judge Graham Elliot decides which chef will clock out, the 12 remaining chefs must use the simplest of tools -- their palate -- to pass a tricky test that impacts their ability to survive a second elimination challenge. Its only hour four, so the chefs are still running on adrenaline and energy ... for now!

programme.title: 24 in 24: Last Chef Standing
programme.desc: The 11 remaining chefs are starting to feel the effects of cooking for seven straight hours. In a shift that tests resourcefulness, Michael Symon and Esther Choi ask the chefs to create a three-course meal worthy of a black-tie event in 60 minutes. But the chefs will have to be resourceful with more than just their time -- ingredients like strawberry milk, pimento cheese, carrot tops, dried scallops, Carolina reaper peppers and shell-on pistachios must also be incorporated into their meal. How they use the ingredients is up to them, but then its up to judge Jet Tila to decide which chef will be clocking out.
